implementation_output.changes_summary: Added ProgramData fallback path to the logs() function in daemon_cmd.py. When the primary log file is not found on Windows (sys.platform == 'win32'), falls back to %PROGRAMDATA%/async-crud-mcp/logs/daemon.log (or .../logs/{username}/daemon.log when --username is used). Added imports: os, sys, pathlib.Path, APP_NAME. Added 3 new tests covering Windows fallback success, non-Windows no-fallback, and both-paths-missing cases.

results.note: sys.platform == 'win32' guard correctly restricts fallback to Windows only
os.environ.get('PROGRAMDATA', 'C:\\ProgramData') uses safe default consistent with paths.py pattern
